bibl.title: Documenting the Roman Army. Essays in Honour of Margaret Roxan
bibl.note: Presented at a colloquium held in honour of Dr. Margaret Roxan at the Institute of Classical Studies in May 2002.
bibl.seg: MAXFIELD Valerie A., Ostraca and the Roman Army in the Eastern Desert.
J.J. WILKES (Ed.), Documenting the Roman Army. Essays in Honour of Margaret Roxan = BICS. Supplement 81 (London, 2003) pp. 153-173.
